about_the_game:
Includes 5 cosmetic items, including the Assault "Deadeye Alpha" suit skin, which uses a specialised burst rifle and shotgun combo to destroy enemies at all ranges!
A Deinonychus Body that lets you be just like a real dinosaur! Equip yourself with cosmetic items and unleash your wild instincts in the fight!

Contains the following content:
Deadeye Alpha Deinonychus Body Set
- Deinonychus Body (Deadeye: Exosuit Skin)
- Warning: Bitey (decal)
- Roar (emote)
- Engaging target! (stamp)
- Chomposaurus (charm)

Note: Items included in this set may also be available for purchase individually or as part of other sets. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
Skins, decals, and charms are cosmetic items that change the appearance of an exosuit and have no other effect.
Emotes and stamps are items that can be used to customize the in-game Comm Wheel.
Obtained additional contents can be used by going from the title screen to the in-game home screen.
Note: This content does not support Steam Family Sharing.

* Capcom may temporarily suspend online services in the event of unforeseen circumstances.

Note: This content does not support Steam Family Sharing.

short_description: Includes 5 cosmetic items, including the Assault "Deadeye Alpha" suit skin, which uses two different types of projectiles to destroy your enemies. A Deinonychus Body that lets you be just like a real dinosaur! Equip yourself with cosmetic items and bring out your wild instincts to fight!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
